dcterms:description: The nuScenes dataset consists of 1000 driving sequences of approximately 20 seconds with a LiDAR frequency of 20Hz. The sequences are split into sets of 700, 150, and 150 for training, validation, and testing and are annotated for 10 classes with a long-tail distribution.
dcterms:title: nuScenes

dcterms:creator: Y. Liao
J. Xie
A. Geiger
dcterms:description: The KITTI dataset provides recordings of a single, roof-mounted, LiDAR scannerâ€™s positional and radiometric measurements, used for urban scene understanding in 2D and 3D.
dcterms:title: KITTI

dcterms:creator: J. Behley
M. Garbade

J. Quenzel
S. Behnke
C. Stachniss
J. Gall
dcterms:description: The SemanticKITTI dataset contains 23k training samples and 20k testing samples in autonomous driving scenes with panoptic segmentation annotations for 8 thing and 12 stuff classes.
dcterms:title: SemanticKITTI
